-NSXbjac58iQWO9txePf.text: ShotSpotter technology has activated in response to three rounds of possible gunfire. These devices pick up gunshots or similarly loud noises such as fireworks or backfiring vehicles.

-NSXbvR7TN3XFYcAm5Wu.text: Police have received multiple 911 calls that a person was shot.

-NSXc086Zwp9xd4aYayc.text: Police are en route to the scene.

-NSXcrug0QBBLsF6swoy.text: Police located a critically injured man who sustained gunshot wounds during the shooting.

-NSXd49X6KNArtNtJL71.text: Police describe the suspect as a Black man in an all-gray sweatsuit with a red mask. He was last seen fleeing toward the nearby housing projects on Park Ave.

-NSXdKtTqjqXHGWXWyyA.text: Officers have also located a vehicle that was struck by stray gunfire.

-NSXhwaQ0WSBPvqvWH2i.text: Officers requested a canvass of nearby hospitals to locate anyone else who may have been injured in the shooting.
